outline:
1. to press, be pressed, make haste, urge, be narrow
    1. (Qal)
      1. to press, hasten
      2. to be pressed, confined, narrow
      3. to hasten, make haste
      4. be narrow
    2. (Hiphil)
      1. to urge, insist
      2. to hasten
strongs_def: to press; (by implication) to be close, hurry, withdraw
